Yandex Disk.name: P12.01
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose that it notifies users when government entities (including courts or other judicial bodies) request their user information?

Yandex Disk.name: P12.02
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose that it notifies users when they receive requests their user information through private processes?

Yandex Disk.name: P12.03
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose situations when it might not notify users, including a description of the types of government requests it is prohibited by law from disclosing to users?
